SEARCH
Package org.spongepowered.api.event.world

Interface ChangeWorldBorderEvent.Player

All Superinterfaces:
Cancellable, ChangeWorldBorderEvent, Event
Enclosing interface:
ChangeWorldBorderEvent
public static interface ChangeWorldBorderEvent.Player extends ChangeWorldBorderEvent
An event that is fired when a player's world border is changed. This may also be fired when a player's border is set or unset.

  • Nested Class Summary
